overview: In the collage video Remote, dream logic invokes a presence that drifts through physical and temporal barriers.  There is a presence lingering in the dark woods, just under the surface of a placid lake and at the end of dreary basement corridor. It’s not easy to locate because it’s outside but also inside. It doesn’t just crawl in on your wires because it’s not a thing. It’s a shocking eruption of electrical energy.
title: Remote
